text: This is my first time to the clinic for health check. The location is very convenient.The staff are friendly. Niki is very good and helpful. She kept checking if I'm comfortable during the procedure. Dr Yeo is very nice and reassuring during my blood taking. Overall, I'm happy to have chosen this clinic for my health check.

I visited Dr Yeo with some concerns regarding scalp health after a hair salon appointment. Dr Yeo was patient and attentive during the check up, which I appreciated very much. He outlined several possible treatments for my issues and was happy to work with me regarding my specific concerns. I would definitely make a return visit should the need arise, and can recommend Dr Yeo's care for anyone seeking medical consultation.

I had a pleasant experience during my tele consultation with Dr Yeo, who was very detailed with understanding my symptoms and promptly delivered the medication I required. Extremely convenient way to visit the doctor without leaving your home when you are not well, highly recommended üëçüèª
Dr Yeo syringed my ears so well, I passed my viva exams on the first try. Excellent technique, great outcome. Would recommend for hearing problems
Dr Yeo is friendly and compassionate. He takes the time to get to know his patients and understand their needs. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a GP.
